content: this is a nice roomy stocking to hold lots of presents instructions for a basic stocking are given first which can be varied by the choice of colours and stitch patterns the pattern is also included for a three colour slip_stitch tweed stocking which looks much cleverer to knit than it is all my ravelry patterns are free to download but if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease you can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here 1 happy knitting 1 https //www justgiving com/page/frankie-brown
